basics.name: Eric Chae
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science on the creative Computational Media Track in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2027.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

highlights: Provide students assistance with material covered during class
Help the students efficiently learn the material so they will be proficient
Create a growth mindset environment where the students can thrive and push to greater heights
Constructive criticism and strive towards improving my skills
Maintain a clean and organized work environment

work.summary: Handled shipping and contracts for customer rentals
highlights: Shipping and receiving of customer goods, both intra-state and inter-state
Provide customers with assistance about their contract for rental equipment
